command: xyz=$(echo _target_ | unfurl -u domain) && /home/op/go/bin/ffuf -t 60 -fc 404 -maxtime 1800 -v -timeout 10 -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Ubuntu Chromium/37.0.2062.94 Chrome/37.0.2062.94 Safari/537.36' -w _wordlist_ -u '_target_/FUZZ' -o $xyz.json -od $xyz -of json ; if [ -f $xyz.json ]; then ffufPostprocessing -result-file $xyz.json -bodies-folder $xyz -delete-bodies -overwrite-result-file && cat $xyz.json | tee -a _output_/_cleantarget_ ; fi
